DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate feasibility Home-based Constraint-Induced Movement Therapy ( hCIMT ) compare Modified Constraint-Induced Movement Therapy ( mCIMT ) deliver outpatient set upper limb motor recovery stroke survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Constraint-Induced Movement Therapy Chronic Stroke Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Home-based Constraint Induced Modified Therapy ( hCIMT ) consist 2 hour intensive upper limb practice shape technique + 2 hour ADLs supervise caregiver . Patients suppose wear mitt unaffected hand 4 hour daily . Modified Constraint Induced Modified Therapy ( mCIMT ) consist 2 hour intensive upper limb practice shape technique supervise experienced physiotherapist + 2 hour ADLs home ( supervise caregiver ) Patients suppose wear mitt unaffected hand 4 hour daily .
